name: Panoneko
description:
Controls:

- UP: Jump / Move up
- DOWN: Move down
- SPACE: Change perspective
- R: Reset

Credits:

- Music "Happy Arcade Tune" by Rezoner
https://opengameart.org/content/happy-arcade-tune
